data.title: Rick Steves Audio Europe™ Travel App
data.meta_description: The Rick Steves Audio Europe™ app organizes Rick's vast library of self-guided walking tours and radio interviews into geographic playlists covering Europe's top sights, travel tips, and cultural insights.
data.text:
The Rick Steves Audio Europe™ app organizes Rick's vast library of self-guided walking tours and radio interviews into geographic playlists covering Europe's top sights, travel tips, and cultural insights.

What's new:

In 4.1.10 (Android only), to fit Google's latest app requirements, app support for versions of Android was raised from Android 4.4 to 13. Learn more.

Read updates to Rick's audio tours since their recording! Use the audio tour's yellow Script icon to find these updates when available at the top of the script.

Lock-screen media controls are unavailable in Android 12 and up.

In 4.1.5 (Apple only), the app will fully shut down after an hour of non-use and a possible battery-drain bug was fixed.

4.1 introduced a bug affecting previously downloaded audio tracks. Apple only. Learn more.

Added support for newer devices.

Various bug fixes.

Features:

This app downloads and stores audio files on your Apple® device running iOS 10.0 or later. The Android version runs on Android 13 or later. No Wi-Fi or cellphone connection is required to listen. (You need a connection to download the audio tracks before you listen.)

Download the audio files before you go or use a Wi-Fi hotspot in Europe to avoid incurring data charges.

View and follow walking-tour maps in the app as you listen to the corresponding tour.

Interview content originates from the "Travel with Rick Steves" public radio program. Self-guided walking tours are excerpted from Rick Steves country and city guidebooks.

More ways to listen:

The same great content is available for listening on Soundcloud.

Download mp3 versions and get pdf maps for any of our audio tours.

Audio content for each destination is available in the Listen sections of our online travel guides.

You can also listen to Across Europe and Notable Travelers tracks.
